Class GroovyShellService

java.lang.Object
de.uni_kiel.rz.fdr.repl.groovy.GroovyShellService
public class GroovyShellService extends Object
Instantiate this class and call start() to start a GroovyShell

    • setDisableImportCompletions

      public void setDisableImportCompletions(boolean disableImportCompletions)
      Disable import completion autoscan.

      Import completion autoscan known to cause problems on a Spring Boot applications packaged in uber-jar. Please, keep in mind that value is written (and persisted) using Java Preferences API. So once written it should be removed by hand (you can use groovysh :set command).

      See Also:
      • groovy-shell-server does not work with jdk11

    • setPasswordAuthenticator
